lorann.game

Class Lorann

  • java.lang.Object
    • lorann.game.Lorann

  • public class Lorann
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will instantiate the game components. And will handle the refreshing rate of the game with the if Condition inside the While loop. condition, meaning the whole game updates each 150 milliseconds. ( Can be modified but this value seems more appropriate to match the original game speed. )
    Author:
    Deqth
